events.name: CB Consumer Confidence
events.info: Survey-based read on U.S. consumer sentiment and spending confidence.

events.name: Initial Jobless Claims
events.info: Weekly labor-market stress indicator; surprises can move rates and index volatility.

events.name: PPI (MoM, YoY) + Core PPI
events.info: Producer-level inflation read often watched as an early signal before CPI/PCE.
